name: Inertia (itch) (markysoft)
description:
Game of skill with intuitive controls - rotate left and right to pilot the ship to the end of the course without crashing.

  • 48 levels of increasing challenge and complexity with water, boosts, and targets!
  • Deterministic gameplay!
  • Action replay to admire your achievements
  • The joy of flight!
  • The spirit of Super Monkey Ball fused with Gravitron and Thrust!

This game is in development and will be getting new features and levels in the future.

The game in action at Vimeo
